tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: déjà vu (AKA Soldier of Love)
programme.desc: Three Navy lieutenants die by homicide in 11 months around Washington. Harm and Meg investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Desert Son
programme.desc: Due to a human error in an exercise, artillery fire injures seven Marines, one of whom later dies.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Brig Break
programme.desc: A sailor has stolen two Stinger missiles from a base. Harm and Meg investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Pilot Error
programme.desc: Two Naval aviators die in a crash of an F-14 while using a new fly-by-wire navigation system.(n)

programme.title: JAG: War Cries
programme.desc: In Lima, Peru, while a boy sneaks into the US embassy at night, a Marine guard stops him.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Old College Try
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover at a university to find a hacker who infiltrates the Federal Reserve and threatens to collapse the world economy.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dam Breakthrough
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Team Scorpion must prevent a catastrophe when torrential rains create a large crack in a dam, threatening to wipe out an entire town in its wake.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: White Out
programme.desc: In order to save a United States Special Forces unit from certain death, Team Scorpion must brave the subzero temperatures of Antarctica.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sun of a Gun
programme.desc: Sylvester comes face to face with his estranged father who asks Team Scorpion for help.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Da Bomb
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is helping with NASA's top secret rocket launch, but they must sabotage their own mission.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Fractured
programme.desc: After a powerful earthquake rocks Los Angeles, Team Scorpion must fix a pinched gas line to prevent a massive explosion.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: As the team split up the fear become palpable. Without the safety of numbers the team are feeling they are being stalked and Glen comes face to face with some unexplained physical phenomena.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the team on edge, they explore deeper into the darkness of this incredible place of mystery and secrets. Is the feeling of unease just in their minds or is something about to reveal itself.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team are still spread thinly across this huge location and without the safety of numbers some of the investigators seem easy prey.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The last part sees the team reach their limits as the spirits of this enormous location continue to emerge from the shadows. But will the enormity of the paranormal activity prove too much for the world-famous team.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: A haunted house, a haunted school and a haunted auction hall, all in one location, Bishton Hall. With stories of poltergeist activity, ghostly figures, strange voices and a dark entity, what will the Most Haunted team uncover tonight.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Ghost of a Marine
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads toMount Joy, Pennsylvania to help out the Great-Great Granddaughter of Alois Bube, the founder of Bube's Brewery.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Vintage Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Liberty, Missouri to investigate the Belvoir Winery.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost Guards
programme.desc: An armory that's been standing for over 100 years harbors a ghostly mystery. Recent female leadership is coinciding with increased paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Flooded Souls
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Hales Bar Dam and Marina in Tennessee, to investigate a dam that was built on Native American land.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Century of Haunting
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Oxford, Massachusetts to help a family in need. The house has been in the Voas family for two generations, and lots of activity has been reported, from apparitions to shadow figures.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Soul Searching
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS revisits Belcourt Castle in Newport, Rhode Island to investigate claims surrounding a deceased friend.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols
programme.desc: The crew seeks for a lost colony of Nietzscheans and discovers another crew that has been secretly helping them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.sub-title: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.sub-title: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.107
programme.desc: Woman countersues roommate's husband for sexual advances amid back rent lawsuit/Man denies requesting mother's payments on Audi A6 in lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.95
programme.desc: An intoxicated teenager confesses to urinating in a friend’s yard; she sues her ex-friend for coming to her workplace and telling everyone about it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.158
programme.desc: College students sue ex-friend over lease break. Woman denies child support responsibility if son not living with her; grandmother sues for medical bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.232
programme.desc: A man accidentally crashes his date's car while teaching her to drive in the snow, leading to a lawsuit. Divorced parents dispute sharing the cost of their teenager's snowboarding camp trip.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.32
programme.desc: A fight over an engagement ring, a damaged SUV, and airline tickets further divides ex-fiancées/Former best friends fight over a computer and whether it was a Christmas gift or a loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.239
programme.desc: A landlord fights with tenants over a new motorcycle ignition, a damaged helmet, and an insurance bill; he countersues for unpaid rent and utilities.\t\t\t\r\nA young woman goes after her former roommate and his girlfriend for rent and a security deposit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.190
programme.desc: A landlord/tenant dispute escalates when a man is accused of illegally entering an apartment on three different occasions and a woman is accused of damaging property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.118
programme.desc: Teenage brothers' domestic assault leads to mother suing ex-husband for sons' attorney fees/Man sued by older girlfriend for car money owed, disputes gift claim.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.185
programme.desc: A woman’s life-long dream to have plastic surgery is fulfilled by her ex-fiancé who demands that he be paid back; a Christmas day fight over child custody further escalates their fight.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.23
programme.desc: A man is accused of assaulting his daughter and fracturing her back; she sues him for the cost of medical bills/A Harley Davidson is repossessed and a friendship ends when women fight over late payments on the vehicle.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.15
programme.desc: Ex live-in lovers fight over a truck repossession, a large co-signed loan, and insurance/After an arrest for stealing a lawnmower, a man is allegedly bailed out by his girlfriend who claims she helped pay for his gall bladder surgery.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.212
programme.desc: Ex-friends fight over charges on an allegedly stolen credit card.\t\t\t\r\nA man admits that he smashed his ex-girlfriend’s cell phone after reading her texts to another man and claims she is responsible for his belongings being stolen.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: On family night, the team that makes the most fresh pasta for that night's dinner service wins a day of fun at the Santa Monica Pier. An accident sends one contestant to the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The aspiring chefs compete to create the best gourmet pizza, after which the winning team will enjoy a gourmet meal in Santa Barbara and the losing team will take and deliver pizza orders.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must create four dishes with 20 ingredients and a medic rushes to the kitchen when one team member slices more than food.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must prepare dishes in a relay race; the winning team gets a day of fun in the sun; the losing team must clean the entire restaurant; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Two teams are combined into one, and each chef is given one main ingredient and asked to create a dish suitable to chef Ramsay's palate; during the dinner service, the chefs have difficulty getting food out to the patrons.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Get That Prowler
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy unfurl an elaborate sting when they repo a taxicab by tricking its driver into picking them up. But what to do with his ferociously inebriated client? Then, Matt and Froy attempt to repo a DeLorean.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up Up and Away
programme.desc: First, it's up, up, and away, for Lou, Froy, and Matt. All of their skills are tested when they attempt to take down not one, but two hot air balloons. Then, Lou and Froy find themselves in the wrong part of town, repo'ing a sports car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Family Drama
programme.desc: First, Lou, Froy, and Matt team up with Eva, an alluring lending agent, who sets up a sting to repo a limousine from its delinquent owner.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Anniversary Chicken
programme.desc: When Jeff decides to surprise Audrey by remembering their anniversary, he's the one who ends up being surprised. Meanwhile, Timmy is forced to be Russell's interpreter on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Day
programme.desc: When Jeff proclaims it's 'Jeff Day', he gets his way until the cleaning lady arrives. Meanwhile, Adam has to figure out why his eye is twitching.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Zygote
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey see a fertility specialist with their surrogate, they discover a zygote. Meanwhile, Russell and Timmy go on double dates again.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Set Up
programme.desc: When Russell discovers Timmy has a sister, he aims to impress her. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey set their neighbor Liz up on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.sub-title: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Meteor Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this End Times thriller, a gigantic meteor enters Earth's orbit and begins to disintegrate, showering the planet in poisonous debris.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Beneath the icy surface, survivors of Colony Seven struggle as food supplies dwindle and temperatures drop. Plagued by illness, the colonists suspect the worst when they mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five, the only other known settlement.(n)

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: In a lawless and violent time, six young outcasts are hired by an English merchant as 'regulators' to guard his ranch against the mob, a corrupt and powerful ring.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: Tomboy
programme.desc: Frank Kitchen is an assassin at the top of his game. When he's double-crossed, by a group of ruthless gangsters, he falls into the hands of a rogue surgeon known only as The Doctor, who transforms him into a woman against his will.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Lodge
programme.desc: During a weekend trip to the mountains, Mary finds herself at the now run-down lodge where she spent the holidays with her family growing up. She becomes determined to restore the building to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When Ashley’s plans to reconnect with her high school sweetheart over Christmas fails, she and her best friend Liam decide to fake their own romance. But as her feelings start to turn real, Ashley will have to decide what her heart really wants.(n)

programme.title: You Can’t Fight Christmas
programme.desc: Interior designer Leslie Major loves all things Christmas. When she meets handsome Edmund James, she quickly learns he thinks the festivities are frivolous and superficial.(n)

programme.title: Mother Lode
programme.desc: A couple of adventurers go into the wilds of British Columbia in search of a lost colleague, but when their plane crashes they find themselves at the mercy of an isolated, crazy miner.(n)

programme.title: Deadly Patient
programme.desc: When Dr. Hillary Spenser saves the life of Gregory Lipton, he becomes dangerously obsessed with her, threatening the good doctor and all those in her life.(n)

programme.title: Winter Ridge
programme.desc: A young detective is torn apart after his wife ends up in a coma while hunting a serial-killer at the same time.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girl, Cop, Killer? The Bambi Bembenek Story
programme.desc: A former cop is convicted of killing her husband's ex-wife. Based on a true story.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)
A writer (John Cusack) who specializes in debunking supernatural phenomena experiences true terror when he spends a night in a reputedly haunted room of a hotel.(n)

programme.title: Halloween II
programme.desc: Evil comes home to roost, as unstoppable killer Michael Myers (Tyler Mane) returns to Haddonfield to restore his family, together with his ghostly matriarch (Sheri Moon Zombie).(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Due to the trouble in Arizona, the new governor has decided on a shoot-to-kill order and uses vigilantes to stop the lawlessness.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Study of a Crooked Sherriff
programme.desc: Old Man Clanton threatens Behan with replacement unless he stops Earp from rousting his men in Tombstone.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Big Brother
programme.desc: Morgan Earp has been helping Wyatt for a month but Morgan's interest in drinking, women, and hanging with Doc Holliday bothers Wyatt.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Woman of Tucson
programme.desc: Ned Buntline returns to Tombstone to interview widow Amy Jones. She is after money to get out of Tombstone so when Buntline has no money she tries other means, including framing Earp.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Fanatic
programme.desc: Odie Cairns learns that a couple who are True Lighters are moving into the Tombstone area. Odie takes it upon himself to drive the couple out of town which Earp must stop.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: He's My Brother
programme.desc: Marshal Pritchard is severely wounded in front of Doc Goodfellow. Doc tells Earp that he believes the shooter may be mentally unstable and not responsible for his actions.(n)

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.(n)

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Robo Rex
programme.desc: James Miller has only one friend in the world, his beloved Labrador Retriever, Rex. But when a strange capsule lands in the his backyard and a robot dog emerges, his life will never be the same.(n)

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied, Cassandra Evans prays that her nemesis, Katie Sharp, the queen bee of social media, would know what it's like to walk a day in her shoes. Her prayer is answered in an unexpected way when they get "Switched.(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.(n)

programme.title: Let Go
programme.desc: Featuring the king of comedy Kevin Hart, this hilarious, unconventional and heartfelt journey is all about love, loss and other felonies! Discontent parole officer Walter is struggling with the humdrums of married life.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.(n)

programme.title: Fear in the Night
programme.desc: The prep-school headmaster's wife and her lover try tp drive his spouse to kill the headmaster so they can be together.(n)

programme.title: And Soon the Darkness
programme.desc: A cyclist on holiday in Argentina enlists the aid of an American ex-pat to help find her missing friend.(n)

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: The Paris Police recruit the officer of an English ship to help trap counterfeiters by joining them.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Spaceman (REDUX)
programme.desc: While exploring a debris field, the Trans-Utopian discovers a sarcophagus floating in space. Mishkin, the lone occupant, spreads an experimental mind-warping disease among the crew that empowers their alter-egos and cause dangerous conflicts.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Becoming Shiva (REDUX)
programme.desc: A Terran terrorist group protesting the ecological disasters that have plagued them detonate a bomb on the city state space station, Ring Sheppard. The crew are hired to track them down and break the ring up. More easily said than done.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Third Thing (REDUX)
programme.desc: The the in-brain reality TV series "The Third Thing", follow the crew of the Trans-Utopian. Marcus, is given the job of capturing a petty criminal for the show. As the "simple" mission unfolds, it becomes much deadlier than it seemed.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Torment (REDUX)
programme.desc: Percy, Travis, and crew try to rescue a man's parents caught in a cruel time-dilation trap; kidnapped years earlier into a high-speed orbit, they only age 8 months relative to their son's 50 years.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Grains of Sand
programme.desc: Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) faces a difficult decision after saving an infant from a dangerous ring of human traffickers.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Vanguard
programme.desc: Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) must discover why his reunion with a former student (Danny Masterson), who is now a top biomedical researcher, triggers his visions of Stillson (Sean Patrick Flanery) and a future Armageddon.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pad'ar
programme.desc: Pad'ar is a fierce battle game where spectators can connect via a "jack patch" that Liam suspects is causing neurological damage to users. When a Pad'ar warrior dies, it raises even more questions about the safety.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: In Memory
programme.desc: Lili wakes up, supposedly on Earth after a coma, and is told the Jaridians have come and conquered the Taelons. She remembers Sandoval telling her she no longer has and Earth-based physiology and believes things are not as they seem.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Cloister
programme.desc: Zo'or and Da'an travel to a cloister for an energy sharing ceremony, but one of the sisters is killed and everyone is a suspect.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Interview
programme.desc: Zo'or agrees to do a live television interview to try to endear himself to humans, but the show's producer has an ulterior motive in getting him in front of a camera.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary For All Pt 2
programme.desc: The enigmatic Dr. Helen Magnus recruits an insightful forensic psychiatrist Will Zimmerman (ROBIN DUNNE) to join her in the quest to track, study and protect the strange, and often terrifying creatures that secretly populate our world. Part 2.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fata Morgana
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus, her daughter Ashley, and new to the Sanctuary, Dr. Will Zimmerman release three women from a mysterious crypt in Scotland, bringing them back to the Sanctuary for refuge.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)
